author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: The film Jaws has a lot to answer for in western attitudes but it is also distressing to see video of fishermen cutting the fins off and then throwing the poor creatures back in the sea to die.

author: Larry
content:
This is beyond disappointing.

Time to wake up and protect the apex predators in the ocean.

Wish more people knew about the potential effects of losing these magnificent creatures.
